conbody.p: This publication provides an introduction to the p32 High Performance 32-bit Application Binary Interface (ABI).
conbody.note: This document is a preliminary release and as such is incomplete and contains information that is subject to change although every effort has been made to ensure the contents are accurate at the time of writing. Future versions of this document will provide more comprehensive information.

section.title: Related publications
section.p: The following documents contain information that may be useful to read in conjunction with this document:

section.title: Obtaining publications
section.p: You can obtain documentation in the following ways:

ul.li: You can also view release notes by typing either grelnotes or relnotes on a command line.
You can also view man pages by typing man title on a command line.
